resources.string: Choose a category of data to view
In order for the app to use your location, you need to grant this permission. You can choose not to, but the app will not display your location.
Rate us on the Play Store

This app displays data from The LIST (Land Information System Tasmania), see here. Specifically, the app displays data from the public ArcGIS REST Service which can be found here. Data provided via The LIST is subject to terms and conditions set out here. Note this link leads to a PDF file of the terms and conditions.


LISTData viewer is not created, supported or endorsed by The LIST, the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment, or the State Government. It has been developed by ex nihilum as a freely available mobile viewer for publicly accessible data from The LIST. Note that The LIST data is generally subject to Creative Commons 3 (or attribution) licencing. 


Queries regarding LISTData viewer can be directed to the creator via the link below.
